text:
2
Incidentally , Dp. Maddy arranged an innovation in
the Music Camp program this year with a meeting of
the JCST Board. Ralph, Judith Waller, Prank Dunham,
Walter Emory, and others were in attendance. Burton
was there as your NAEB representative and will testify
to the genuine miracle performed by Maddy every year.
As a single example, our radio equipment included five
Ampex recorders, a new building with two control rooms,
and two studios.
I trust you will keep me in mind, and write when you
have the time.
Cordially yours,
Tom D* Rishworth
